attribute.name: allowdefaultlang
attribute.deprecated: Since the new language behaviours in OpenWGA 5.1 this attribute is ignored.

tag.name: root
tag.description: Implicit root tag for tml elements. Needs not to be used inside WebTML-Modules.

tag.name: image
tag.description: Output of an html image for an webgate image resource

tag.name: collection
tag.description: Collection of documents, found by a query

tag.name: element
tag.description: Base class for the pluggable Element-Architecture, where one can write a TML-Tag without modifying the tld

tag.name: button
tag.description: A Button to be used inside tml:form

tag.name: between
tag.description: Does output only, if there is another document following in iteration

tag.name: meta
tag.description: Output of metadata items of the content

tag.name: warnings
tag.description: Output of tml warnings for debugging

tag.name: foreach
tag.description: Iterates over documents and values or just n times

tag.name: versions
tag.description: Navigator of the versions of one page

tag.name: select
tag.description: Root tag for case and caseElse, to control their behaviour

tag.name: level
tag.description: Does output only on specified levels of the current context document

tag.name: form
tag.description: Output of HTML-Form for use with TML-Actions.

tag.name: body
tag.description: Makes it possible for Element-Tags to have a re-iterating body

tag.name: groupchange
tag.description: Monitors an expression result, and outputs its body, only if this changes

tag.name: createpage
tag.description: Render information for BI to create new page controls

tag.name: createbutton
tag.description: Render information for BI to create new page controls

tag.name: eventscript
tag.description: Execute TMLScript when a portlet event was thrown

tag.name: caseelse
tag.description: Output of body, only if all case-Tags of the surrounding Select-Tag have failed

tag.name: languages
tag.description: Navigator of the languages of one page

tag.name: sitemap
tag.description: Navigates through the whole area hierarchically, even through whole site if allareas="true"

tag.name: action
tag.description: Creates a stored TML-Action to be invoked via URL

tag.name: range
tag.description: A "no function" tag that marks a range of tml code. Enables designer to use the general attributes for tml tags without additional functionality

tag.name: htmlhead
tag.description: Creates HTML code to be placed in HTML-head

tag.name: areas
tag.description: Navigator of areas (One root content for each area)
